link-description: Some day I’ll get around to actually quoting nice bits out of this article and sharing it properly &c., but I just came across this (a year and a half after it was published, I know), and it is brilliant IMO. If you haven’t read it yet, but have anything to do with software engineering, building, or any interest in computers at all really, please read it. I might change my mind later but for right now, it seems brilliant to me.
